description: Contents: Jacob ben Asher, fragments from Ṭur, Ḥoshen Mishpaṭ (f. 1). Tanḥum ben Joseph of Jerusalem, Murshid al-kāfī (ff. 2v-312r). Responsa fragment (f. 313). Anonymous Arabic treatise (f. 314r). David ben Joshua ben Abraham Maimonides, Treatise on measures (ff. 314v-316v).
title: Miscellany
author: Tanḥum ben Joseph, of Jerusalem
